task.summary:
Add `actix-files` dependency and refactor server logic
Added `actix-files` to `Cargo.toml` for enhanced file handling. Updated `main.rs` to include `asset_endpoint` imports and corrected improper usage of `server.await` to avoid redundant execution. Cleaned up IntelliJ `.idea` configuration to align with updated project structure.

Add custom error handling for Actix Web
Introduce a centralized error type leveraging `thiserror` for custom error handling in the Actix Web template. Updated the `test_endpoint` to use the new error type, ensuring consistency and better readability. Modified `Cargo.toml` to include the `thiserror` dependency.

Update project name placeholder in package.json
Replaced the static project name with a dynamic placeholder '{{project_name}}'. This allows for greater flexibility when reusing or templating the repository.

Add Tauri project template with Vite and Rust integration
Introduce a new Tauri template configured for Vite and React, with Rust-based backend handling and capability management. Includes sample configuration files, build scripts, and default icons to streamline the development of desktop applications.

Fix placeholder in Rust main file template
Replaced hardcoded `project_name` with a template placeholder `{{project_name}}`. Ensures proper substitution during project generation.

Update Cargo.toml to use a placeholder for author field
Replaced the hardcoded "you" with a "{{author}}" placeholder in the authors field. This ensures consistent templating and better customization for project initialization.

MESSAGE.value:
Refactor IntelliJ configuration files
Deleted obsolete .idea files and replaced them with new module and workspace settings. Updated vcs.xml configuration to fix Git directory mapping.

Add Vite development server support
Introduce a `start_vite_server` function to conditionally start the Vite server in development mode. Refactor to use a DEBUG constant for clearer code semantics and improve logging messages.

Remove dev.js script and update npm dev script
Deleted the `dev.js` script which was responsible for starting the API and Vite servers. Updated the `dev` npm script to use `cargo watch` directly, simplifying the development process and removing Node.js dependency for script orchestration.

Add `actix-files` dependency and refactor server logic
Added `actix-files` to `Cargo.toml` for enhanced file handling. Updated `main.rs` to include `asset_endpoint` imports and corrected improper usage of `server.await` to avoid redundant execution. Cleaned up IntelliJ `.idea` configuration to align with updated project structure.

Add custom error handling for Actix Web
Introduce a centralized error type leveraging `thiserror` for custom error handling in the Actix Web template. Updated the `test_endpoint` to use the new error type, ensuring consistency and better readability. Modified `Cargo.toml` to include the `thiserror` dependency.

Update project name placeholder in package.json
Replaced the static project name with a dynamic placeholder '{{project_name}}'. This allows for greater flexibility when reusing or templating the repository.

Add Tauri project template with Vite and Rust integration
Introduce a new Tauri template configured for Vite and React, with Rust-based backend handling and capability management. Includes sample configuration files, build scripts, and default icons to streamline the development of desktop applications.

Fix placeholder in Rust main file template
Replaced hardcoded `project_name` with a template placeholder `{{project_name}}`. Ensures proper substitution during project generation.

Update Cargo.toml to use a placeholder for author field
Replaced the hardcoded "you" with a "{{author}}" placeholder in the authors field. This ensures consistent templating and better customization for project initialization.
